HomePage.subcopy: From idea to implementation—web, mobile, and software solutions built fast, scalable, and tailored to your brand.

why.title: Why us?
why.desc: Clear process, modern stack, and brand-first execution that keeps quality and speed in balance.

grid.galleryDesc: See our latest works and case studies.

trust.text: Trusted by ambitious startups & bold brands

featured.title: From zero to category‑leader in 7 weeks
featured.desc: Brand repositioning, identity and conversion‑first website for a SaaS startup.

cta.title: Ready to grow your brand?

identity.desc: Logo, typography, color system, motion & design tokens that scale.

content.title: Content & Social
content.desc: Art‑direction for social, templates, content calendars and AI‑assisted copy.

case.desc: Story‑driven showcases that highlight outcomes, not just deliverables.

support.desc: Retainers for growth, iteration and rapid experiments.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.desc: A short workshop to align on goals and constraints.

design.title: Design
design.desc: Identity, system, key screens and motion samples.

iterate.title: Iterate
iterate.desc: Tight feedback loops, then polish and QA.

launch.title: Launch

1.quote: They captured our essence fast and shipped a site that converts.
1.name: Sahar • Nova

2.quote: A rare combo of taste, speed and business understanding.
2.name: Arman • Vertex

3.quote: The design system made our product UI consistent overnight.
3.name: Neda • Helix

1.a: We scope transparently. Most engagements land between $3–12k depending on scope.

2.a: Yes. We compress timelines when needed and keep feedback cycles tight.

3.q: Can you migrate our old site?
3.a: Absolutely. We handle content migration, redirects and SEO hygiene.
